ygData.subject: Goodbye Friends, I'll Never Forget ANY Of You!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Like Minime, I am leaving too.  But, I m not so sure that this leave is temporary.  I may come back one day.    One day.  Good bye all, I ll never forget any

   Like Minime, I am leaving too.  But, I'm not so sure that this leave is =
temporary.  I may come back one day.    One day.  Good bye all, I'll never =
forget any single one of you.  

      Until then, my chars go out to:

   =
Necromancer: Cyberwolf
   Hell Drak: Lilli(Logomorph)
   Wheeljack: Alloran=

   Skulletron: Jason Lind
   Sickle: Shomin [*Note 1*]
   Lavacons: Yansho=
sh [*Note 2*]
   Elements Force: Shomin[*Note 3*]
   Dollen: Roborick
   De=
cadel: JP3884
   Hakibuscon: Dachande
(If I missed any other of my chars, t=
hen they are up for grabs)

*Note 1=3DSickle is just a floating seethrough =
entity, and he can change his shape, but when he changes his shape, he is j=
ust still his entity self, but he is not just a floating whatever, also, Si=
ckle may come in handy with Child's story or something, since he is not a t=
ransformer, and he comes from the Abyss

*Note 2=3DThe Lavacons at anytime =
can transform into a different form of themselves e.g. Dark Lavacons, Fire =
Lavacons, Water Lavacons, Bomb Lavacons, Ground Lavacons, or whatever

*Not=
e 3=3DThe Elements can change into different elements, like the Lavacons, e=
xcpet they aint transformers.  And they can control things and stuff with t=
heir element type so if they are plant element, they can make trees grow an=
d stuff they also may come in handy with Child's story, they come from the =
Dimension of Elements
